product_name: Sea to Summit Pocket Shaving Soap
long_description: Compact and convenient Sea To Summit Pocket Shaving Soap lets you keep a clean shave without hauling around a huge container of shaving cream. Small plastic case holds 50 thin leaves of soap; remove 1 - 2 leaves with dry hands and dissolve in water for use as liquid soap. Soap is biodegradable and phosphate free. Soap has a light green tea fragrance. Compliant with TSA carry-on luggage regulations.
short_description: Compact and convenient Sea To Summit Pocket Shaving Soap lets you keep a clean shave without hauling around a huge container of shaving cream.
